title.narrative: Responding to the urgent health needs in communities affected by Tropical Storms Eta and Iota in Guatemala

description.narrative: The main objective of this project is to ensure continuity and availability of life-saving health services to prevent disproportionate mortality and morbidity among vulnerable populations. This WHO project distributes essential emergency medical equipment and supplies to emergency wards, installs water supply systems in health facilities and provides rapid training to local health staff to provide first aid and medical consultations among other activities. The project provides life-saving assistance to approximately 12,500 people, including 3,500 women, 3,100 men, 6,000 children, and 107 people with disabilities.
